full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DRAG PO LCOG BRDUNG BYA TSUL DGRA BGEGS BRLAG BYED RDO RJE'I THOG MDA' ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @019B (ZHES DRAG PO LCOG BRDUNG GI CHO GA DGRA BGEGS BRLAG BYED RDO RJE'I THOG MDA' ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, GRUB PA'I DBANG PHYUG CHEN PO PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS KYIS MDZAD PA'I GSHED 'DUL DRAG PO LCOG BRDUNG GI CHO GA GZHIR RTEN, THUN MONG DANG THUN MONG MA YIN PA'I SHIN TU GSANG BA'I GTER KHA LAS KYANG KHA SBYOR DBYE BA SOGS BSNAN PA DANG, DAM PA'I PHYAG LEN GYIS BRGYAN TE, CHAGS MDO THANG PA RIG 'DZIN MI BSKYOD RIGS KYI RDO RJE'I BU DKON MCHOG BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS BGYIS PA 'DIS KYANG GZHAN DON GRUB PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,)
